channel.title: Acquisitions Services Group Podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: When selling your privately owned business the difference between 'doing it right' and 'doing it wrong' will be many hundreds of thousands of dollars.
channel.itunes:author: Barry Evans
channel.itunes:summary: Over 25 years of experience in selling privately owned business is intelligently, concisely and understandably formatted into just 20 minutes.
channel.description: An 'old pro' in selling businesses, and someone who, with partners owns a number of privately owned business (aggregate annual revenues over $30 million), candidly shares a wealth of information to help people who are considering selling their businesses to do it right the first time!

item.title: The Essential Steps of Selling a Privately Owned Business
item.itunes:author: Barry Evans
item.itunes:subtitle: When selling your privately owned business the difference between 'doing it right' and 'doing it wrong' will be many hundreds of thousands of dollars.
item.itunes:summary: Over 25 years of experience in selling privately owned business is intelligently, concisely and understandably formatted into just 20 minutes.
item.description: An 'old pro' in selling businesses, and someone who, with partners owns a number of privately owned business (aggregate annual revenues over $30 million), candidly shares a wealth of information to help people who are considering selling their businesses to do it right the first time!
item.itunes:keywords: mergers, steps, asg, business, selling, privately, owned
